function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of cooperation and coordination in international policy making","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to interconnectedness and interdependencies of everyday life.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of political trust, transparency, and action leading to ineffective disease containment efforts.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance to embrace individual responsibility for public health and welfare, hindering disease containment efforts.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Polarized and negative news coverage of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustained exposure to negative covid-19 news causing stress and desensitisation","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of covid-19 news","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information on vaccination status","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of pre-existing medical conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of anxiety and fear related to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High fear of covid-19 due to pre-existing conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoidance of news about covid-19","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Losing interest in news about covid-19","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreasing/diminished interest and avoidance of news about covid-19","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic fatigue leading to desensitization and avoidance of news about the pandemic","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoidance and denial of covid-19-related information leading to reduced compliance with public health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Younger individuals losing interest in covid-19 news","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater post-traumatic stress symptoms associated with decreasing interest in covid-19 news","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged exposure to negative news about covid-19 causing desensitization","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreasing burden of negative information about covid-19 in media may decrease stress but also public interest in covid-19 news.","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater utilization of secondary interpersonal information sources like friends and relatives may increase the risk of covid-19 fatigue and decrease interest in pandemic news.","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on healthcare professionals for covid-19 information may lead to greater trust in the information but could result in decreased public interest in pandemic news.","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection bias in online survey due to majority of respondents being women and aged 40 years.","category":"Research and Data risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Younger age implicated as a risk factor for non-adherence to public/social pandemic control measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of news about covid-19 associated with specific demographic and psychological factors.","category":"Media risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of far-uvc light in occupied public settings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to aerosolized h1n1 influenza virus through far-uvc light testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inactivation of human coronaviruses with far-uvc light","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious coronaviruses in aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of viral integration in human lung host cells","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to aerosolized viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmission potential of coronaviruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of biological damage from uv light","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease sensitivity to uv light","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in virus survival assays","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Similar uv sensitivity across coronaviruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to 222 nm far-uvc light in public places","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous far-uvc exposure at regulatory limits","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to far-uvc light","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate regulatory dose limits","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of viral strains in human cell lines.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Generation and exposure of viral aerosols in an aerosol irradiation chamber.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to aerosolized viruses in the uv exposure chamber","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection of the uv exposure chamber","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient dosimetry of the uv exposure chamber","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to high-intensity uv radiation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased transmission of uv radiation through plastic windows","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol particle exposure to high uv dose","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to aerosolized virus particles during the experimental protocol","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling virus infectivity assays without proper safety protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
